snippet: The United States is expressing strong support for a proposed 72-hour cease-fire in the monthlong war between Israel and Hamas....

headline.print_headline: US Expresses Support for Mideast Cease-Fire
headline.main: US Expresses Support for Mideast Cease-Fire

lead_paragraph: The United States is expressing strong support for a proposed 72-hour cease-fire in the monthlong war between Israel and Hamas.
